subject: Rugby (Game)
World Cup 2011 (Rugby)
lead_paragraph: Wales, whose hopes were high after its Six Nations success, is now mired in a five-test losing streak and in danger of dropping to the third tier of seedings for the 2015 Rugby World Cup draw.
snippet: Wales, whose hopes were high after its Six Nations success, is now mired in a five-test losing streak and in danger of dropping to the third tier of seedings for the 2015 Rugby World Cup draw.
